subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Darrelle Revis was cleared for contact Thursday after missing last week’s game with a concussion, but Jets coach Rex Ryan would not say if Revis would play Sunday against the Dolphins.
snippet: Darrelle Revis was cleared for contact Thursday after missing last week’s game with a concussion, but Jets coach Rex Ryan would not say if Revis would play Sunday against the Dolphins.
